title: If you grow potatoes from other potatoes how did we start growing them? - Quora

response.answer_text: They started propagating with seeds like any other vegetable. This involved random genetic mutation like anything else. They later evolved the additional capability to grow “eyes” through that same genetic mutation process. The eyes produce a clone of the potato. Farmers mainly use the eye method rather than the seed method to grow potatoes because it is more predictable. They use the seed method when experimenting with new potato types.
